{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer C58HP(UN)1.0-02.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1350 High Power Wireless Dual Band Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C58HP.html |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/Archer-C58HP/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C58HP_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C58 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HP |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1350 |series = Archer C58 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C58HP |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9561;QCA9561-AL3A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 750 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = high power |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/13/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0792P6XFW |asin_country = IN |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 3T3R N + 2T2R AC (450 + 867 Mbps) {{see also|TP-LINK Archer C series|TP-LINK}}
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Archer C58HP(UN)1.0-01.jpg| File:Archer C58HP(UN)1.0-02.jpg| File:Archer C58HP(UN)1.0-03.jpg| File:Archer C58HP(UN)1.0-04.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== * [[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3150 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz Dual-Core CPU, USB 2.0/3.0, 4x Gbe [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01AK9TC0Y Amazon] * [[TP-LINK Archer C1200]] - ''AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C1200 TE7C1200] (08/31/2016) (BCM)<!-- :[[Broadcom]] switch, [[Proware]] manuf --> * [[TP-LINK Archer C60 v2.0]] - ''AC1350 Wireless Dual Band Router'' • [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C60.html PPage] :3T3R N + 2T2R AC (450 + 867 Mbps) * [[TP-LINK Archer C59 v1.x]] - ''AC1350 Wireless Dual Band Router'' • [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C59.html PPage] :3T3R N + 2T2R AC (450 + 867 Mbps), 1x USB 2.0 * [[TP-LINK Archer C58 v1.x]] - ''AC1350 Wireless Dual Band Router'' • [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C58.html PPage] :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9563-AL3A (3T3R N) + QCA9886 (2T2R AC) * [[TP-LINK Archer C50 v1.x]] - ''AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C50 TE7C50] (05/2015) [[MediaTek]] ([[MTK]]) * [[TP-LINK Archer C50 v2.x]] - ''AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C50V2 TE7C50V2] (05/02/2016) [[Qualcomm Atheros]]/([[QCA]]) * [[TP-LINK Archer C28HP]] - ''AC900 High Power Wireless Dual Band Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C28HP TE7C28HP] (10/28/2016), Zentel RAM, 12V/1.5A :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9561-AL3A (3T3R N) + QCA9887 (1T1R AC)
